summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 'encargado_linea' role functionality. All core requirements verified successfully including role creation, menu restrictions, access controls, and work order permissions.
passed_tests: Backend: Admin authentication and user management
Backend: encargado_linea role creation and login
Backend: encargado_linea can create corrective orders
Backend: encargado_linea CANNOT create preventive orders (403 rejection)
Backend: Role exists in users endpoint and can be updated
Frontend: 'Encargado Línea' role visible in user role selector
Frontend: encargado_linea users redirected to /work-orders/corrective on login
Frontend: Sidebar only shows 'Órdenes Correctivas' for encargado_linea users
Frontend: Access to preventive orders blocked (redirects to corrective)
Frontend: Can access corrective order creation forms
